metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14409 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 2.0.12 has an Integer Overflow (and resultant SDL_memcpy heap corruption) in SDL_BlitCopy in video/SDL_blit_copy.c via a crafted .BMP file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-14409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl2-2.0-0 - 2.0.14+dfsg2-3
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> for libsdl1.2, this was fixed by CVE-2019-7637

criterions.comment: libsdl2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.14+dfsg2-3').
